author: A_Brickset_user
title: good bucket
review: I got this set from my sister. There are ALOT of good pieces in here like 1x1s, 1x3s, a blue door, a window and all sorts of other good bricks and what not. And she gave it to me for only a buck. A very good deal. :)

author: backdraft
title: Small, kind starter set
review:
I bought this set on an online auction. It was unopened. I think it's almost incredible for a nearly 20-year-old LEGO set.
I found useful items and a nice but simple mini-figure in the box. There are a large and two smaller bags for the pieces and a minifigure. The small green motherboard and the guide are not wrapped up.
I think it is a perfect starter set.

My rating of 4/5

author: Chunky_Sauce
title: 4285-1 Lego Review
review: This set is a really fun way to introduce a child to lego, through allowing them to create their own models, with the set also including a nice part selection, allowing for a helicopter, car or a house to be constructed. Overall good set and plenty of inspiration from the manual.
